projects.name: Belle Full
projects.about: A Meal Application featuring a landing page, meals page and a page to view saved meals. A user can search for a meal, see the details pertaining to the meal, save the meal and also view all saved meals for later use.

projects.name: Countries Rest API
projects.about: List of Countries of the world from the Countries REST API, Featuring individual Pages for each Country showcasing the basic facts about each country. I had great fun building this and optimising it to be BLAZINGLY FAST for the amount of data being fetched and displayed.

projects.name: Rock Paper Scissors
projects.about: A Rock Paper Scissors Game built with React. Featuring A powerful AI designed to be efficient and unpredictable. Select your choice between Rock, Paper or Scissors and battle the AI immersing yourself in beautiful transitions and animations.

projects.name: Crappo CryptoCurrency App
projects.about: Crappo CryptoCurrency App Landing page, The best crypto currency exchange available with the best imaginary service there is!. I had a lot of fun building this as i used it to learn nextjs.

projects.name: Space Tourism
projects.about: Explore space with this website, made for space enthusiasts. Join your crew and see the technologies you'll travel with and to the destinations available. Interactive and filled with Animations.

projects.name: Card Details Form
projects.about: A little webpage featuring form validation and visualisations and logic on how frontend form / card validations should be done. You Can share your opinions by Forking Contributing to this awesome project.

projects.about: Bookmark landing Page. Bookmark provides bookmarking Services for you across three browsers: Chrome, Firefox and Opera.

projects.name: Url Shortener
projects.about: Shortly, A URL shortener. Its a landing page as well as a service, just copy and paste your Links and it shortens it for you keeping all meta-data. you can copy the link and never lose it as its saved to your browser.
